29_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body: IMO, the problem with this is that the more a centralized solution is popular, the more chance is has to be compromised. I still think is a good alternative for people needing to communicate securely with someone who does not want to install GPG or secured messaging clients like Signal.
